text.text_translated: At first, Pi was frightened of the animals, which made him jump into the ocean. But then he remembered that there were hungry sharks in the water around him and realised his only option was to climb back into the lifeboat. One by one, the animals in the lifeboat killed and ate each other, until only Pi and the tiger were left. Fortunately for Pi, the tiger, who he named Richard Parker, was seasick and was not immediately interested in eating him.
